The Juice Shop is susceptible to a know: The Juice Shop is susceptible to a known vulnerability in a library, for which an advisory has already been issued, marking the Juice Shop as known affected. A fix is still pending. Inform the shop about a suitable checksum as proof that you did your due diligence.
Security Advisories are often listed in: Security Advisories are often listed in the security.txt
When answered truthfully, all security q: When answered truthfully, all security questions are susceptible to online research (on Facebook, LinkedIn etc.) and often even brute force. If at all, they should not be used as the only factor for a security-relevant function.
What's your favorite place to go hiking?: What's your favorite place to go hiking?
Do you remember the security question th: Do you remember the security question that Jim used for his account?
A developer was careless with hardcoding: A developer was careless with hardcoding unused, but still valid credentials for a testing account on the client-side.
Have a look at the client-side code in t: Have a look at the client-side code in the dev console.
Drop some explosive data into a vulnerab: Drop some explosive data into a vulnerable file-handling endpoint.
This one is actually similar to the XXE: This one is actually similar to the XXE DoS challenge in every way except the data format being (ab)used.
Log in with the (non-existing) accountan: Log in with the (non-existing) accountant acc0unt4nt@defcon.33 without ever registering that user.
Forge an almost properly RSA-signed JWT: Forge an almost properly RSA-signed JWT token that impersonates the (non-existing) user rsa_lord@defcon.33.
The security flaw behind this challenge: The security flaw behind this challenge is 100% DEF CON 33 Merch Store's fault and 0% Google's.
Forge an essentially unsigned JWT token: Forge an essentially unsigned JWT token that impersonates the (non-existing) user jwtn3d@defcon.33.

DEF CON will always be a cash-at-the-doo: DEF CON will always be a cash-at-the-door conference. We will always honor the LineCon. This is the way. Preregistration guarantees you'll receive a DEF CON 33 Human badge (as opposed to a paper badge, if we run out) when redeeming your ticket in Las Vegas. Badges must be picked up onsite.
